issue.title: [Python][C++] Cast compute kernel segfaults when called with a Table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16652](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16652). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Passing a Table to `{pyarrow.compute.cast` with a scalar type gives a segfault:

```Java

In [1]: table = pa.table({'a': [1, 2]})

In [2]: import pyarrow.compute as pc

In [3]: pc.cast(table, pa.int64())
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
```
